Hmm, I want something to collapse those huge stack traces... Either (+) on left sidebar (like in Java editor) or Mylar's filtering of the unrelated content. :-)
Ooo, that would be nice, and not too hard to do.  E.g. only show top 5, then collapse rest.  OK, nobody is allowed to think about this until 1.0 is out ;)
We may need some sort of dummy editor input that signifies the case of missing data then give it special treatment in the MylarTaskEditor.
Fixed with better message showing when there is no repository data for the editor, prompting synch.
